content: day 13 / 24 just a common pine cone abbreviations chain - chain flo - front loop only mc - magic_ring blo - back loop only difficulty slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet time 45 min increase - increase half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet material yarnart jeans hook 2 mm decrease- decrease double_crochet - double_crochet written pattern base round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet 6 6 total round 2 increase blo x 6 12 total round 3 increase blo single_crochet blo x 6 18 total round 5 single_crochet 18 blo 18 total pine cone - decreasing note remember to stuff the cone before it becomes too narrow the flos should be on the outside continue working in blo decrease each 6th stitch until 10 stitches left then decrease each 3rd until 6 stitches left do not cut the yarn turn note you can additionally sew the hole pine cone - structure continue with the same yarn as the previous part * half_double_crochet flo double_crochet flo half_double_crochet flo all in the same loop slip_stitch in the next stitch x2 repeat from * until the end of flo all the way down to the end of the base cut the yarn and weave the ends in hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the pine cone congratulations you finished the 13th ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 11 to go
